title: How does temperature affect electricity? - Quora

response.answer_text: Temperature affects how electricity flows through an electrical circuit by changing the speed at which the electrons travel. This is due to an increase in resistance of the circuit that results from an increase in temperature. Likewise, resistance is decreased with decreasing temperatures.

A good way to understand how temperature affects electricity is to understand the many way temperature is measured with electricity. In order to measure temperature, the temperature must affect the measurement device. Adafruit Industries, Unique & fun DIY electronics and kits
